title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5114.5 - Subsidiaries
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5114.5 - Subsidiaries

State Regulations
(a) Each video
lottery gaming agent or holding company thereof shall report immediately, in
writing, to the commission the formation or dissolution of, or any transfer of
a non-publicly traded interest in, any subsidiary of the video lottery gaming
agent or any subsidiary of any holding company of the video lottery gaming
agent that bears any relationship to the video lottery gaming
facility. (b) Each video lottery
gaming agent shall file with the commission such documents for each subsidiary
of the video lottery gaming agent as may be requested by the
commission. (c) The commission
shall undertake any review of the license necessitated by the financial
change. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5114.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
